name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: Distributer - 文章动态一键同步分发工具
name.en: Distributer - One-click Article and Dynamic Sync & Distribution Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 一键同步、分发文章、动态等内容到多个自媒体平台
short.en: One-click synchronization and distribution of articles, posts, dynamics, and other content across multiple media platforms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Distributer 是一款专为内容创作者、自媒体人设计的谷歌浏览器插件，帮助您将文章、动态等内容一键同步到多个自媒体平台。无论是微信公众号、微博、知乎还是其他国内外主流平台，Distributer 都可以助您快速覆盖更多受众，节省时间和精力。插件支持实时更新与管理，方便快捷，提高内容分发效率。安装 Distributer，开启一键分发新体验！

主要功能：

	•	一键同步分发：将内容发布到多个平台
        •	自定义各平台语言：为不同平台分别选择不同语言
        •	AI 自动翻译：使用 AI 自动将初始版本翻译为不同的语言
        •	AI 生成内容：根据你的灵感片段，AI 自动生成文字
	•	支持多种内容类型：包括文章、动态等
	•	平台兼容性强：支持国内外主流自媒体平台
	•	提高发布效率，扩大内容影响力

Distributer 助您更轻松地管理内容分发，让您的作品触及更多受众。立即安装，体验高效的内容分发工具！
long.en:
Effortlessly manage content distribution with Distributer! This Google Chrome extension is designed for content creators, media professionals, and businesses, enabling one-click synchronization and distribution of articles, posts, videos, and more across multiple media platforms. Whether you’re targeting social platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Medium, or LinkedIn, Distributer helps maximize your audience reach and saves time. With real-time updates and seamless content management, it’s the ultimate tool for efficient multi-platform distribution. Install Distributer today and streamline your content distribution process!

Key Features:

	•	One-click sync and distribute: Publish content across multiple platforms
	•	Customize platform languages: Choose different languages for each platform individually.
	•	AI automatic translation: Use AI to automatically translate the initial version into various languages.
	•	AI-generated content: Automatically generate text based on your inspiration snippets.
	•	Supports multiple content types: Articles, posts, videos, and more
	•	Compatible with major media platforms
	•	Boost efficiency and expand your content’s reach

Perfect for content creators, media professionals, and marketing teams, Distributer makes multi-platform content management simple and effective. Install now and reach more audiences with ease!
